0.text: Innate - The Secret Weapon: Zac gains increased percentage size equal to 1.5% of his bonus health, capped at 35% increased size at 2333.33 bonus health. Zac's size also reduces based on his missing health, down to 70% total size while at 0% health.
0.html: Innate - The Secret Weapon: Zac gains increased percentage size equal to 1.5% of his bonus health, capped at 35% increased size at 2333.33 bonus health. Zac's size also reduces based on his missing health, down to 70% total size while at 0% health.

1.text:
Innate - Goo: Whenever Zac damages at least one enemy with an ability, he sheds a number of chunks of himself to a nearby location, landing towards nearby  visible enemy  champions and lasting for 6 seconds.
 Stretching Strikes: 1 chunk for each strike hit (excluding the collision) on different targets, up to 2
 Unstable Matter: 1 chunk if it hits at least one target
 Elastic Slingshot: 1 chunk for each enemy champion hit
 Let's Bounce!: 1 chunk for each bounce that hits an enemy champion, up to 4
1.html:
Innate - Goo: Whenever Zac damages at least one enemy with an ability, he sheds a number of chunks of himself to a nearby location, landing towards nearby visible enemy champions and lasting for 6 seconds.

  • Stretching Strikes: 1 chunk for each strike hit (excluding the collision) on different targets, up to 2
  • Unstable Matter: 1 chunk if it hits at least one target
  • Elastic Slingshot: 1 chunk for each enemy champion hit
  • Let's Bounce!: 1 chunk for each bounce that hits an enemy champion, up to 4
markedPassages: visible
champions
Stretching Strikes
Unstable Matter
Elastic Slingshot
Let's Bounce!

2.text: Both Zac and enemy champions can interact with a chunk by being within 50 units of it: an enemy will destroy it, while Zac will consume it to  heal for 4 / 5 / 6 / 7% (based on  Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health.
2.html: Both Zac and enemy champions can interact with a chunk by being within 50 units of it: an enemy will destroy it, while Zac will consume it to heal for 4 / 5 / 6 / 7% (based on Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health.
markedPassages: heal
4 / 5 / 6 / 7% (based on Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health
4 / 5 / 6 / 7% (based on  Let's Bounce!'s Rank) of his maximum health
4 / 5 / 6 / 7% (based on Let's Bounce!'s Rank)

3.text: Innate: Periodically, upon taking  fatal damage, Zac enters  resurrection for 8 / 7 / 6 / 5 / 4 (based on level) seconds and restores 50% of his maximum health, splitting into 4 uncontrollable  Bloblets. Each bloblet has 12% of his maximum health and moves towards Zac's location over the duration. Any damage the bloblets receive, excluding damage dealt in excess of their total health, is also redirected to Zac in  true damage. While in resurrection, Zac is  untargetable and  unable to act, and cannot take damage from sources other than the redirected damage from his bloblets.
3.html: Innate: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Zac enters resurrection for 8 / 7 / 6 / 5 / 4 (based on level) seconds and restores 50% of his maximum health, splitting into 4 uncontrollable Bloblets. Each bloblet has 12% of his maximum health and moves towards Zac's location over the duration. Any damage the bloblets receive, excluding damage dealt in excess of their total health, is also redirected to Zac in  true damage. While in resurrection, Zac is untargetable and unable to act, and cannot take damage from sources other than the redirected damage from his bloblets.
markedPassages: fatal damage
resurrection
12% of his maximum health
true damage
untargetable
unable to act

4.text: After the duration, Zac is revived with 10 - 50% maximum health. Zac will die once all bloblets are killed.
4.html: After the duration, Zac is revived with 10 - 50% maximum health. Zac will die once all bloblets are killed.
markedPassages: 10 - 50% maximum health

5.text: See Pets for more details about bloblets.
5.html: See Pets for more details about bloblets.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about bloblets.

0.text: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage,  slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a  tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
0.html: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage, slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds, during which they are revealed.
markedPassages: slowing
tether
revealed

1.text: While the tether persists, Zac's next basic attack is replaced by a second Stretching Strike, empowering it to have a 0.25-second cast time and gain  25 bonus attack range. This attack cannot  critically strike.
1.html: While the tether persists, Zac's next basic attack is replaced by a second Stretching Strike, empowering it to have a 0.25-second cast time and gain  25 bonus attack range. This attack cannot critically strike.
markedPassages: 25 bonus attack range
critically strike

2.text: If the two Stretching Strikes affect different targets, both are  rooted for 0.5 seconds and receive the same  slow. After a 0.4-second delay, Zac displaces them toward each other over 300-units, though not through terrain.
2.html: If the two Stretching Strikes affect different targets, both are rooted for 0.5 seconds and receive the same slow. After a 0.4-second delay, Zac displaces them toward each other over 300-units, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: rooted
slow

3.text: If the two targets are near each other, they are instead slammed together through the displacement, dealing the initial magic damage and  knocking them up and  stunning them for 0.25 seconds upon impact. Surrounding enemies are also dealt the initial magic damage.
3.html: If the two targets are near each other, they are instead slammed together through the displacement, dealing the initial magic damage and knocking them up and stunning them for 0.25 seconds upon impact. Surrounding enemies are also dealt the initial magic damage.
markedPassages: knocking them up
stunning

4.text: Both Stretching Strikes (the cast and the empowered attack)  reset Zac's basic attack timer. Zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.
4.html: Both Stretching Strikes (the cast and the empowered attack) reset Zac's basic attack timer. Zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.
markedPassages: reset
possibleConcerningAbilities: Both Stretching Strikes (the cast and the empowered attack)  reset Zac's basic attack timer. Zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.

0.text: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.
0.html: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against minions and monsters.

0.content: 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

1.text: Zac grants  ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
1.html: Zac grants ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: ghosting

2.text: Unstable Matter's  current cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a  Cell Division chunk.
2.html: Unstable Matter's  current cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a Cell Division chunk.
markedPassages: current cooldown
Cell Division

0.text: Active: Zac  charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.
0.html: Active: Zac charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.
markedPassages: charges
range

1.text: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.
1.html: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.
markedPassages: health cost
cooldown

2.text: Recast: Zac  leaps to the target location. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up and  stuns them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.
2.html: Recast: Zac leaps to the target location. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up and stuns them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.
markedPassages: leaps
knocks them up
stuns

3.text: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Passive: Healing from  Cell Division chunks is increased.

markedPassages: Cell Division

1.text: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains  20% − 50% (based on duration) bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and cast  Stretching Strikes and  Elastic Slingshot.
1.html: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains  20% − 50% (based on duration) bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and cast Stretching Strikes and Elastic Slingshot.

20% − 50% (based on duration) bonus movement speed

2.text: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit,  knocks them back over 1 second, and  slows them by 20% for the same duration.
2.html: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit, knocks them back over 1 second, and slows them by 20% for the same duration.
markedPassages: knocks them back
slows

3.text: An enemy can be hit by multiple bounces, but ones beyond the first deal 50% damage to them and do not apply the  knock back.

concerningSkills.skillName: both stretching strikes (the cast and the empowered attack) reset zac's basic attack timer. zac is unable to move or attack while his left arm is in flight.

textContent.text: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.
textContent.html: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against minions and monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.
Active: Zac explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, capped against  minions and  monsters.

markedPassages: (+ 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

textContent.text: Zac grants  ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
textContent.html: Zac grants ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.

textContent.text: Unstable Matter's  current cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a  Cell Division chunk.
textContent.html: Unstable Matter's  current cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Zac collects a Cell Division chunk.

textContent.text: Active: Zac  charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.
textContent.html: Active: Zac charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Zac  charges for up to 4.5 seconds to increase Elastic Slingshot's  range over a cone in the target direction.

textContent.text: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.
textContent.html: Elastic Slingshot can be recast within the duration. If Zac cancels the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's  health cost and  cooldown are refunded.

textContent.text: Recast: Zac  leaps to the target location. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up and  stuns them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.
textContent.html: Recast: Zac leaps to the target location. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up and stuns them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.

skillTabs.concerningText: Recast: Zac  leaps to the target location. Upon landing, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up and  stuns them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.

textContent.text: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
textContent.html: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Elastic Slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

concerningSkills.skillName: elastic slingshot will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

textContent.text: Passive: Healing from  Cell Division chunks is increased.
textContent.html: Passive: Healing from Cell Division chunks is increased.

skillTabs.concerningText: Passive: Healing from  Cell Division chunks is increased.

textContent.text: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains  20% − 50% (based on duration) bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and cast  Stretching Strikes and  Elastic Slingshot.
textContent.html: Active: Zac bounces after the cast time, then bounces 3 additional times each second over 3 seconds, during which he also gains  20% − 50% (based on duration) bonus movement speed but becomes unable to declare basic attacks and cast Stretching Strikes and Elastic Slingshot.

textContent.text: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit,  knocks them back over 1 second, and  slows them by 20% for the same duration.
textContent.html: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit, knocks them back over 1 second, and slows them by 20% for the same duration.

skillTabs.concerningText: Each bounce deals magic damage to enemies hit,  knocks them back over 1 second, and  slows them by 20% for the same duration.

textContent.text: An enemy can be hit by multiple bounces, but ones beyond the first deal 50% damage to them and do not apply the  knock back.
textContent.html: An enemy can be hit by multiple bounces, but ones beyond the first deal 50% damage to them and do not apply the knock back.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+500 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1.75% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds that increases subsequent Immolate damage by 10%, stacking up to 6 times for a 60% increase.

Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Guiding Light: Upon casting your ultimate, you Transcend for 9 seconds. While Transcended, increase your maximum health by 15% and cause you and all allies within 1200 units to heal for 3% of your maximum health upon you Transcending and every 3 seconds thereafter (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – GUIDING LIGHT: Upon casting your ultimate, you Transcend for 9 seconds. While Transcended, increase your maximum health by 15% and cause you and all allies within  1200 units to  heal for 3% of your maximum health upon you Transcending and every 3 seconds thereafter (90 second cooldown).

Unique – Critical Resilience: Reduces incoming critical strike damage from basic attacks by 20%.
